gradeDescription: A = I excelled at everything I did today!
whatIDidToday: played with as many buddies as possible
noteworthyComments: I had so much fun playing with my friends today, Riker was of course my best friend today, but I also enjoyed playing with Larry and all the other dogs. There were a few times I demand barked at my friends when they tried to take a break from play but I listened to my instructors well when the helped me move on. I did pretty well for the take it leave it exercise, I very much enjoyed it.
